name: Lasting Power of Attorney SnCT
description: A subset of the Snomed-CT clinical terminology (i.e. coding system) intended for use in the UK, previously named SnomedCTUK, that describes the place of death. Any code from the SNOMED CT UK CDA Care Setting Type subset with subset original id 47771000000138.
